CustomField.description: This field stores the Status of the Billing Account creation . The possible values are Requested - Denotes that the Create billing account Request in SAP has been initiated from DSR record in SF . Completed - Denotes the Billing account has been successfully created in Salesforce after success response from SAP Error - Denotes there has been some error in between the three Systems i.e SF , CAMUNDA , SAP billing account creation has failed.
CustomField.label: Integration Status
